hero.title:

hero.subtitle: From Local Dreams To Global Seams

whoWeAre.title: WHO WE ARE
whoWeAre.body: <0>Panovi</0> is a textile factory in the Republic of North Macedonia <1>(Made in EUROPE)</1> founded in 1999 by <2>Pance Panov</2>; a factory specializing in work and corporate clothing. Panovi actively produces over 60,000 pieces per month, with maximum quality, for customers across Europe.

visit.title: Visit our local factory
visit.body: See where craftsmanship meets innovation. Located in the heart of Probishtip, North Macedonia.

quality.title: What proves our quality
quality.body: Certifications that speak for us: <0>OEKO-TEX®</0> & <1>TÜV Austria</1>. Trusted by standards. Proven by results.

process.title: How we make it happen
process.body: Crafted with care. Backed by process. Every step is optimized for precision, efficiency, and sustainability.

gallery.title: Our Textile Factory
gallery.subtitle: A modern textile facility specialized in high-quality workwear and corporate apparel — driven by innovation, precision, and over two decades of industry expertise.

differentiators: Modern textile factory with high level of mechanization
Advanced software for real-time production monitoring
Complete solutions for workwear and corporate clothing
25+ years of experience in textile industry
Most competitive factory in the region

intro.p1: <0>PANOVI</0> is a modern textile factory located in the Republic of North Macedonia – <1>at the heart of Europe</1>, proudly labeled <2>Made in Europe</2>. Founded in <3>1999</3> by <4>Panche Panov</4>, the company has built a strong reputation over more than two decades as a <5>reliable and professional partner</5> in textile manufacturing.
intro.p2: The factory is <0>specialized in the production of workwear and corporate clothing</0>, fully tailored to meet the needs of clients across various industries.
intro.p3: With a <0>production capacity of over 60,000 garments per month</0>, <1>PANOVI</1> successfully serves <2>clients all across Europe</2>, always delivering <3>maximum quality and precision</3> in every detail.
intro.p4: What sets us apart is our <0>commitment to the price–quality ratio</0>, making <1>PANOVI</1> a recognizable name in the textile industry. We combine <2>experience, advanced technology, and high production standards</2> to build long-term partnerships and trust with our clients.

excellence.p1: Our core motivation lies in delivering <0>quality</0> and a <1>flawless appearance</1> in every single product we create. To ensure maximum efficiency and precision, <2>PANOVI</2> operates with the <3>latest generation cutting technology</3>, allowing for perfect preparation of every garment produced.
excellence.p2: With over <0>25 years of experience</0> in the textile industry, we are today one of the most <1>competitive and in-demand factories</1> in the region, known for our <2>reliability, organization, and high-quality craftsmanship</2>.
excellence.p3: Our commitment to meeting the highest industry standards is confirmed through internationally recognized certifications, including <0>OEKO-TEX® STeP</0>, <1>TÜV AUSTRIA</1>, <2>ISO 9001:2015</2>, <3>ISO 14001:2015</3>, <4>ISO 45001:2018</4>, <5>SA8000:2014</5> and <6>SEDEX SMETA 4</6>, ensuring our production complies with strict criteria for environmental sustainability, safety, and social responsibility.

highlights.title: What Makes Us Different
highlights.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every aspect of our operation, from advanced technology to sustainable practices.

standOut.title: You Stand Out
standOut.body: Modern textile factory with a <0>high level of mechanization</0>, a <1>well-structured organizational system</1>, and advanced software for real-time production monitoring. Thanks to our production process, we offer <2>complete solutions for workwear and corporate clothing</2>, tailored to meet the specific needs of each client.

ready.title: Ready to Work With Us?
ready.subtitle: Experience the PANOVI difference. From concept to completion, we deliver textile solutions that exceed expectations.

certsSection.title: Our Certifications
certsSection.subtitle: We maintain the highest international standards through rigorous certification processes that validate our commitment to quality, safety, and sustainability.
certsSection.bannerSubtitle: A state-of-the-art facility where traditional craftsmanship meets modern technology, delivering premium textile solutions for clients across Europe.

steps.title: Advanced Pattern & Cutting
steps.label: Automated CAD/CAM Systems
steps.description: State-of-the-art automated cutting systems ensuring precision and minimal waste in every piece.

steps.title: Expert Craftsmanship
steps.label: JUKI Professional Series
steps.description: Skilled artisans operating professional JUKI equipment with precision and attention to detail.

steps.title: Precision Overlocking
steps.label: JUKI MO-3900 Series
steps.description: Professional JUKI MO-3900 series machines delivering perfect seam finishing and durability.

steps.title: Specialized Finishing
steps.label: EH 30 Specialist Equipment
steps.description: EH 30 specialized equipment for advanced finishing techniques and quality enhancement.

teaser.title: Ready to Experience Our Quality?
teaser.description: Our combination of international certifications, advanced equipment, and expert craftsmanship ensures every product meets the highest standards. From automated cutting to precision finishing, we deliver excellence at every stage.

hero.description: From automated cutting systems to precision finishing, our state-of-the-art equipment and expert craftsmanship ensure exceptional quality at every stage of production
Our comprehensive certification portfolio demonstrates unwavering commitment to quality, environmental responsibility, worker safety, and sustainable manufacturing practices

processCertificates.title: Our Certifications

teaser.title: Complete Standards Compliance
teaser.description: Our comprehensive certification portfolio spanning quality, environmental management, worker safety, sustainability, and energy efficiency demonstrates our total commitment to responsible manufacturing. Combined with advanced equipment and expert craftsmanship, we deliver excellence at every stage.

hero.description: Ready to discuss your textile manufacturing needs? Our certified facility and expert team are here to deliver premium solutions that exceed your expectations

teaser.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
teaser.description: With our ISO-certified facility, advanced JUKI equipment, and 25+ years of experience, we're ready to handle projects of any scale. From small custom orders to large production runs, we deliver quality that meets international standards.

map.title: Find Our Location
map.subtitle: Visit our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility equipped with professional JUKI equipment and certified to international standards.
